spaceUnification module

class spaceUnification.Projector(netLength, numDimensions, learningRate=0.01)

Bases: object

Feature vector projector.

Uses a Self-Organizing Maps (SOM) model to obtain content spectra.

Attributes:

netLength (int): Shape for the specter to obtain (netLength * netLength).

numDimensions: Number of dimensions in the training vectors.

learningRate: Learning rate for the SOM model.

fit(featureVectors, epochs=10)

Starts the SOM model training.

Args:

featureVectors (numpy.ndarray): Set of training feature vectors.

epochs (int): Number of training iterations.

getProjection(featureVectors, documentSink=None)

Gets the feature vectors projection in a pretrained SOM model.

Args:

featureVectors (numpy.ndarray): Set of feature vectors to project.

documentSink (DocumentSink): Projected vectors sink. When a documentSink is not provided a projection matrix is returned.

Returns:

Projection matrix in case a projected vectors sink is not provided (DocumentSink).

loadSomModel(inputPath)

Loads a pretrained SOM model.

Args:

inputPath (str): File input path.

saveSomModel(outputPath)

Saves the trained SOM model.

Args:

outputPath (str): SOM model output path.

class spaceUnification.Reader

Bases: object

Feature vectors reader.

abstract readFeatureVectors()

Loads feature vectors in memory.

class spaceUnification.VectorReader(inputPath)

Bases: spaceUnification.Reader

Feature vectors reader.

Attributes:

inputPath (str): Input file path. This file must be a valid jsonl file with the next format:

{«id»: document id, «vector»: feature vector} …

readFeatureVectors()

Loads feature vectors in memory.

Returns:

Feature vectors set.
